alert.note: Alert for North Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 1:01AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Itasca and northeastern Cass Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 101 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Longville, or 20 miles east of Walker, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Boy River around 105 AM CDT. Remer around 115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Days High Landing, Cohasset, Zemple, Pokegama Lake and Pokegama Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
